text: Kitabata te'om tomalokara prati aratirna karaiche ye, yetiya tomaloke allahara ayatasamuha asbikara karaa suniba arau bidraupa karaa suniba tetiya tomaloke sihamtara lagata nabahiba, yetiya laike sihamte ana kono kathata nibista nahaya; an'yatha tomaloke'o sihamtara darae'i haâ€™ba. Niscaya allahe munaphikasakalaka arau kaphirasakalaka jahannamata ekatraita karaiba
